Meeting Location: 528 Cottage ST NE, Fourth Floor Hearing Room,
Details: Oral Argument in MA-008-14, Nash v. State of Oregon, Department of Human Services

Meeting Location: 3930 Fairview Industrial Drive SE, Main Hearing Room

Details: The Oregon Investment Council will hold a regular meeting at the listed date, time and location. Meeting end time is approximate. The meeting location is accessible to persons with disabilities. A request for an interpreter for the hearing impaired or for other accommodations for persons with disabilities should be made at least 48 hours before the meeting to Oregon State Treasury – Investment Division, Attention: Martha Kellams at 503-378-4111. In Martha’s absence, other staff will assist with these requests. The agenda may be accessed on our web site one week prior to the scheduled meeting.
